title: Video: Blood Orange – Champagne Coast
body:
Mr.

chameleon himself **Dev Hynes** and his new project **[Blood Orange](https://www.facebook.com/pages/Blood-Orange/141094315950968)** hasn’t exactly set my world alight since it emerged last year. The album undoubtedly had some great tracks; it just didn’t completely sell me on its substance.

The new video directed by **Haley Wollens**, for the track _Champagne Coast,_ goes to some lengths to rectify the matter. Using jerky, awkward and at times down right creepy animations, the work is an interestingly surreal and digitally demonic alternate reality.

It also features **Karley Sciortino**, awwww yeah.
